summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingIdeal for all hair types, this medium-hold hairspray is powered by spirulina protein and avocado oil to nourish, strengthen, and tame frizz for a sleek, smooth finish. Shine Seal Technology locks in shine and shields against humidity, ensuring lasting style.
details: DetailsBenefitsSalon-born flexible hairspray with 4-day frizz controlKey IngredientsAvocado Oil: Moisturizes, tames frizz and smooths.Shine Seal Technology: Help seal hair, providing a super high shine finish.Spirulina Protein: Strengthening micro algae that supports healthy looking hair.Formulated WithoutGlutenParabensSulfatesMineral OilSiliconePEGsItem 2634092How To UseMist over dry hair during and after styling and build for more hold and frizz control.Pro Tips: Apply the hairspray in short bursts to areas where most control and hold is needed, focusing on the mid-lengths and ends for a flexible finish. Apply to sections of dry hair before flat-ironing or curling for heat protection, smoothing and setting hold.Pre-caution: FLAMMABLE. CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE. Avoid spraying near eyes. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 120°F (50°C). Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Keep away from heat/sparks/open flames/hot surfaces - no smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents may be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children.IngredientsHydrofluorocarbon 152a, Alcohol Denat., Disiloxane, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Isododecane, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentaoleate, Spirulina Platensis Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Water (Aqua/Eau), Aminomethyl Propanol, Polyquaternium-59, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), LimoneneShipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Mist over dry hair during and after styling and build for more hold and frizz control.Pro Tips: Apply the hairspray in short bursts to areas where most control and hold is needed, focusing on the mid-lengths and ends for a flexible finish. Apply to sections of dry hair before flat-ironing or curling for heat protection, smoothing and setting hold.Pre-caution: FLAMMABLE. CONTENTS UNDER PRESSURE. Avoid spraying near eyes. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 120°F (50°C). Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Keep away from heat/sparks/open flames/hot surfaces - no smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating and inhaling contents may be harmful or fatal. Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.headline: Lightweight frizz free hold
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] The IGK Good Behavior Flexible Anti-Frizz Hairspray gives hold without the crunch, keeping my style smooth and frizz-free all day. It feels lightweight, adds a healthy shine, and brushes out easily without leaving residue

reviews.headline: It works if you can stand the SMELL
reviews.comments: This works wonders in my big frizzy hair. It keeps my hair from expanding in the Texas heat and humidity.  However the smell is TOXIC and doesnt fade until I wash my hair. Gross plastic vanilla smell. Barf.

reviews.headline: Must try!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Such a great hairspray! It gets the job done, holding styles in place while minimizing frizz. It leaves hair manageable and works awesome with 2nd day hair. The scent leans towards fresh, definitively not overpowering. Easy to travel with size!

reviews.headline: Did not stop the frizz
reviews.comments: My hair was frizzy than without it! Returned it after the first use.

reviews.headline: Works Great!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This hairspray is great! I love the smell of it and love that it doesn't make my hair super stiff. I wish that it didn't make my hair as shiny but it does the job!

reviews.headline: Awesome product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Holds hairstyles really well , doesn't leave any residue after wearing for long periods of time . Packaging is cute . The scent isn't super strong or unpleasant either .

reviews.headline: i like this
reviews.comments: really like this product i dont use hairspray much but this does not have much of that annoying crispyness that normal hairspray causes and its good on my curly hair

reviews.headline: It's ok
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Let me preface this by saying I don't use hairspray a lot. With that being said I think it works good and serves its purpose and holds curls. However , to me the scent is overpowering.

reviews.headline: nice!
reviews.comments: i really enjoy this hairspray! i've been using it before work to hold my waves/soothe frizz and so far it's been great! the packaging is super cute, i like leaving it out on my shelf haha

reviews.headline: love it !!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I actually really love this hairspray! Hairsprays are hard to find because I feel like a lot of them leave my hair noticeably crunchy looking. This one smooths your hair and gives a good hold without making your hair crunchy looking

reviews.headline: decent
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] helped keep my hair in place, i wanted a looser look and i achieved exactly what i was trying to achieve. no notice of shine, smells like hairspray, cute package

reviews.headline: Not crunchy
reviews.comments: The photo I took is after a concert where I was jumping and singing and there is no frizz I sprayed this on after doing a blow out and my hair stay silky soft and no frizz!! The smell is actually pleasant. And the packaging is just the iconic IGK PACKAGING! no crunchy hair spray here.

reviews.headline: Helps my frizzy hair be more smooth and soft
reviews.comments: I really enjoy this product, I don't tend to use a ton of hair spray but I have used this one a few times and it really does help contain frizz and it doesn't feel overly stiff like a lot of hair sprays I've tried before. It has a light scent and seems to last all day.

reviews.comments: ¨Í received these product for free form inflenster and brand (s) in exchange for my honest review¨. Í like it because they stay all day my hair without any crunch and it doesń' t frizz, smell good.

reviews.headline: Keeps curls
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love to use it after I curl my wigs so that they stay curly all day and it doesn't frizz. It's easy to use and the smell isn't horrible. I will be buying it again!

reviews.headline: Useful
reviews.comments: This hairspray smells really good and has a great hold it does kinda leave a white cast or like build up in you hair so don't use a lot at once but it is super useful when paired with something

reviews.headline: I would recommend this product
reviews.comments: I live in Houston and this held up really well. The flyaways weren't there. It didn't get frizzy during the humidity.. I would definitely recommend this product. I'm not fond on the smell, but everything else is good.

reviews.headline: Works well
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This hairspray works well for me. It helps keep all my flyawayas in place while I'm at work. The smell of the hairspray is not overwhelming, which is a plus for me as strong smelling sprays irritate my allergies.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: When I get a silk press I use this every 2-3 days. It helps hold my curls, prevents shedding and frizz

reviews.headline: Basic
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I wasn't sure exactly what the hairspray was suppose to be doing.  It did help with frizz since it wetted down my hair.  My hair was also still able to move and it was flexible.  It just didn't hold very well and  didn't last long.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

IGK Good Behavior Flexible Anti-Frizz Hairspray is an excellent choice if you want a light, buildable hold with a smooth, shiny finish. It layers well, allowing you to add more for extra hold without becoming sticky or stiff. Your hair stays touchable, and you can easily comb through it without any crunch. It's particularly effective for taming frizz while still allowing movement, and I was impressed that it held up against light rain without any frizz.

The downside is that the can is somewhat small, and the price seems a bit high for what you receive. However, it definitely has that luxury feel; it looks fantastic on your counter and feels like a splurge item. The scent is on the heavier side, which could be a dealbreaker for some, but it dissipates. Also, while it helps smooth and control hair, I don't believe it offers true all-day hold. 

Overall, I really like it, but it depends on what you're looking for—if you want a flexible, frizz-fighting spray that looks chic and performs well in light weather, it's a solid choice.
faceoff_positive.headline: Lightweight Hold with a Luxe Touch

faceoff_negative.comments:
I received the product for an honest review. I was super excited to try this product, especially since it's a 2-in-1 hairspray and heat protectant—such a cool concept! Unfortunately, it didn't work well for my hair type, and I really wanted to love it.

I have fine, curly/wavy hair, and I typically wash my hair every few days. After using this product, I noticed my hair became incredibly oily within just a couple of hours. I ended up having to wash my hair after every use because it looked greasy, which isn't ideal for me. While it did tame frizz and has a really nice scent, the oiliness was a dealbreaker. 

On the positive side, there was no crunchiness—my hair felt very soft, which I liked. I tried pairing it with dry shampoo to combat the oiliness, but it only helped for a short time before my hair looked greasy again. 

Overall, I think this product could work for others, but for my hair type, it's not a good fit. I appreciate the innovation, but I won't be repurchasing.
faceoff_negative.headline: Great Concept, But Left My Hair Oily
